FuncDef: The clear lldp mdn neighbor command clears MDN neighbor information on all interfaces or a specified interface. The clear lldp mdn neighbor command clears MDN neighbor information on all interfaces or a specified interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears MDN neighbor information on a specified interface.
If this parameter is not specified, MDN neighbor information of all interfaces is cleared.
-

Clears MDN neighbor information on a specified interface.
If this parameter is not specified, MDN neighbor information of all interfaces is cleared.
-

Examples: Warning: This Command will clear the neighbor information of all the ports. Continue? [Y/N]:Y
ExtraInfo: To check MDN neighbor information learned by a device or a specified interface within a specified period of time, run the reset nd neighbor command to clear historical MDN neighbor information on the specified interface or all interfaces.
